title: I think it's going to rain today

subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family violence

abstract: A prayer of hope for tomorrow
description: The icy winter storm of abuse that a 14 year-old boy can bring upon a family. The unleashing of anger to deliberate acts of violence. Summer will come again but it will just take awhile.
